name: Welcome to the Dark
description:
Welcome to the Dark is a first person psychological-horror set on a space station with a 60’s aesthetic, where you’re hunted by a techno-organic parasite that assimilates more and more of the station of the course of the game.

The game was made by a small team over the course of a few months as an end of year project at AIE over online. Music for the game was created in association with Box Hill Institute.

We hit of development snags along the way, an Artist left only one Designer could access the game and was responsible for building everything in the game and other unexpected pieces of work that popped up. As such there might be a few bugs here and there. The game is still being updated and a new version will be posted soon.
